cards.title: Accents are not supported...
304 Not Modified
cards.description:
Last-Modified is not enough:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Caching

Although, it seems to work with EDGE. Let's do it anyway.

from email.utils import parsedate_tz, mktime_tz
timestamp = mktime_tz(parsedate_tz("Thu, 16 Oct 2014 01:16:17 EDT"))

The code I have right now has time difference:
If-Modified-Since: Thu, 14 Mar 2019 17:33:06 GMT; length=3564
Last-Modified: Fri, 15 Mar 2019 01:32:30 GMT
This should have been a 200 but it was a 304

Next step:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26435530/converting-string-to-datetime-object/26435566#26435566
